name: BioHackAcademy_Tehran
body:
This page is dedicated to documenting progress of [2nd Bio-HAck Academy](https://waag.org/en/project/biohack-academy-biofactory) in Tehran Held at [CARBON Ideas Studio|FabLab](http://carbonstudio.ir), started from 15th September 2015. This page would be managed by [AliMirakbari](https://ir.linkedin.com/pub/ali-mirakbari/25/764/a09), the Local coordinator/Tutor of program.This is an educationl program of Waag Society Amsterdam; held for the first time in the Spring of 2015. The course is fully open source and distributed through partner labs around the globe. 

### Need help?
Wants to know more? Check out [Parent page](http://biohackacademy.github.io/bha2/) or send emails to amirali@carbonstudio.ir
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
